query:
SELECT 
                tm.user_id,
                u.username,
                tm.team_id,
                CASE 
                    WHEN tm.team_id = $1 THEN 'home'
                    WHEN tm.team_id = $2 THEN 'away'
                END as team_side
            FROM team_members tm
            JOIN users u ON tm.user_id = u.id
            WHERE tm.team_id IN ($1, $2) AND tm.status = 'active'
